about_the_game:
Upgrade Your Fleet

Upgrade your fleet with the ghostly Undead sloop Wraith and her crafty Captain Merriden Windreaper Harrowfel!

Bundle Contents

  • Undead Sloop: 'Wraith'
  • Undead Captain: 'Merriden Windreaper Harrowfel'
  • 3 Undead Mates
  • 'Nocturne' Skin

Undead Passive

Siphon: Undead ships have lower Armor values, but compensate by using a siphon effect where their armor repairs automatically by dealing cannon damage. This means extended engagements tend to favor the Undead.

Ship Passive

Ghostly: When damaged by enemy ships, Wraith turns ephemeral for a short duration and projectiles pass through it harmlessly!

This passive enables Wraith to play more aggressively or successfully get away without taking damage. It can also allow allies to attack enemy ships without fear of friendly fire.

Ship Tier X

Phantom Push: Cannonballs knock ships back. Critical hits increase knockback force.

Phantom Push amplifies Wraith's natural evasiveness, allowing her to control enemy positioning when firing. In particular, ample rear cannons means chasing down Wraith is a difficult task.

New Captain: Merriden ‘Windreaper’ Harrowfel

The first Undead captain released is Merridan with the ability ‘Darkest Door’.

This ability allows players to teleport forward after a brief charge time. This ability can be used in Dead Waters or even while being boarded!
